personal_statement_what_to_improve: Spend a bit more time proofreading your application and checking to ensure that the sentence structure and vocabulary selected is correct. Spend more time writing about what you have learnt and demonstrating your passion for teaching, rather than duplicating your work experience.
subject_knowledge_what_to_improve: Consider other areas and experiences you have had that had added to your subject knowledge beyond just the degree content.
qualifications_other_reason_details: Degree is in an unrelated subject, we would expect demonstrable work experience in the chose subject if degree is unrelated.
